channel.title: Dialogue Systems on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Dialogue Systems on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: IntellAgent: A Multi-Agent Framework for Evaluating Conversational AI Systems
item.description: IntellAgent: a novel open-source framework automating diverse conversational AI evaluation via policy-driven graph modeling, event generation, and user-agent simulations, enabling fine-grained diagnos…

item.title: Exploring the Inquiry-Diagnosis Relationship with Advanced Patient Simulators
item.description: AI-powered medical consultations often struggle with the inquiry phase. This paper presents a novel patient simulator trained on real interactions, revealing that effective inquiry significantly impac…

item.title: Friends-MMC: A Dataset for Multi-modal Multi-party Conversation Understanding
item.description: Friends-MMC: A new dataset facilitates multi-modal multi-party conversation understanding by providing 24,000+ utterances with video, audio, and speaker annotations, enabling advancements in character…

item.title: DEMO: Reframing Dialogue Interaction with Fine-grained Element Modeling
item.description: DEMO benchmark revolutionizes dialogue modeling by focusing on fine-grained elements (Prelude, Interlocution, Epilogue), enabling comprehensive evaluation and superior agent performance.

item.title: Teaching Embodied Reinforcement Learning Agents: Informativeness and Diversity of Language Use
item.description: Teaching AI agents with diverse and informative language feedback dramatically improves their learning, generalization, and adaptability.

item.title: A Pointer Network-based Approach for Joint Extraction and Detection of Multi-Label Multi-Class Intents
item.description: This research introduces MLMCID, a novel pointer network architecture that excels at jointly extracting multiple intent spans and detecting multi-label, multi-class intents from complex, multilingual …
